data.name: VEGA Conflict - Punisher Pack
data.detailed_description:
The most essential piece of any Xeno Division fleet is the brutal, all-purpose Punisher Cruiser. Now is the time to get yours! Buy this pack and receive the following:

Punisher Cruiser (x3) - Soak up Alien damage with the Punisher’s built-in 40% Alien Damage Resistance, then unleash devastation on any targets in your path.

20,000 Coins - Providing you with the ability to build upon your base assets with the latest tech and resources. Bonus Coins will ensure you make your mark in the sector.

Bonus consumable credits to ensure your Punishers are the ultimate Alien-killing machine:

- Xeno Disintegrator Cannon I (x12)
- Xeno Munitions I (x3)
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: The most essential piece of any Xeno Division fleet is the brutal, all-purpose Punisher Cruiser. Now is the time to get yours! Pick up this pack to receive 3 Punisher Cruisers, as well as a full complement of Xeno Disintegrator Cannons to rain down destruction upon the Alien menace.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Portuguese-Brazil
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP+
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.8GHz, SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible with OS

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7+
  • Processor: Dual Core 1.8GHz, SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any compatible with OS
